body.p: 1. Hashum’s son, who obeyed Ezra’s exhortation to divorce his pagan wife after the exile (Ezr 10:33).
2. Bani’s son, who obeyed Ezra’s exhortation to divorce his pagan wife after the exile (Ezr 10:37).
3. Head of Joiarib’s priestly house during the days of Joiakim the high priest in postexilic Jerusalem (Neh 12:19).
